descripcion_original:
atSistemas ni cambia ni se transforma, ¡evoluciona a knowmad mood! 💪


Si en tus propósitos de año tienes apuntado el poder crecer profesionalmente en proyectos punteros y participar en entornos laborales donde la colaboración, la innovación y la diversión cobran protagonismo...


¡en knowmad mood podrás hacer check ✔️!


A través de esta oportunidad participarás en un nuevo Squad de desarrollo con proyectos totalmente desde cero en un importante cliente del sector textil, como desarrollador/a o analista programador/a Java.


✔️ Trabajarás 100% remoto.

✔️ Aportarás ideas en el equipo para implementar en los nuevos proyectos.

✔️ Trabajarás con tecnologías punteras del mercado.


Para hacer match....

- Experiencia sólida en Java (al menos 5 años).

- Experiencia desarrollando con Java de la versión 8 en adelante con experiencia en microservicios(preferentemente Java /17/21).

- Experiencia trabajando con DDD.

- Experiencia trabajando con BBDD relacionales y no relacionales.

- Experiencia con API First/Open API

- Experiencia trabajando con colas (Kafka preferible).

- Experiencia con test unitarios, integración. Automatización de test.

- Conocimientos o experiencia en arquitectura hexagonal.


¿Cuáles son nuestros propósitos para ti?


❤️ Apoyarte en tu crecimiento profesional

  • Evolution mood: tendrás a tu disposición procesos diseñados específicamente para tus funciones y objetivos de crecimiento dentro de la compañía, junto con nuestro mapa de carreras, una herramienta para diseñar tu plan de desarrollo profesional.
  • Formaciones: si bien quieres acceder a formaciones técnicas en habilidades o idiomas, tenemos a tu disposición certificaciones oficiales, Udemy Business, TechDays, Meetups, planes de formación...


🧡 Promover en conjunto la salud, el bienestar y ¡El buen ambiente!


  • Conciliación vida familiar y laboral: nos gusta que tengas equilibrio en tu vida personal y en tu carrera profesional, por lo que disfrutamos de 22 días de vacaciones + 2 días de libre disposición + 24 y 31 de diciembre, además de opciones de teletrabajo, horario flexible y jornada intensiva los viernes y en verano.
  • Quokka: promovemos el bienestar emocional, la actividad física, y la nutrición saludable mediante nuestro programa de actividades.
  • Actividades de Teambuilding: nos gusta divertirnos y estar en contacto con nuestros.
  • Friends mood: puedes ser Embajador de nuestra marca a través de nuestro Plan Amigo.
  • Club de ventajas: Programa de beneficios y descuentos (ocio, tecnología, bienestar...)
  • Kudos: fomentamos una cultura de feedback y reconocimiento :)


💛 Acordarnos de ti en tus momentos más especiales


  • Sorpresas: Tendrás alguna sorpresa asegurada durante el año (aniversario de trabajo, cumpleaños, nacimientos..).


¿Te gustaría ser partícipe de nuestra evolución?
descripcion: atSistemas ni cambia ni se transforma, ¡evoluciona a knowmad mood! 💪Si en tus propósitos de año tienes apuntado el poder crecer profesionalmente en proyectos punteros y participar en entornos laborales donde la colaboración, la innovación y la diversión cobran protagonismo...¡en knowmad mood podrás hacer check ✔️!A través de esta oportunidad participarás en un nuevo Squad de desarrollo con proyectos totalmente desde cero en un importante cliente del sector textil, como desarrollador/a o analista programador/a Java.✔️ Trabajarás 100% remoto.✔️ Aportarás ideas en el equipo para implementar en los nuevos proyectos.✔️ Trabajarás con tecnologías punteras del mercado.Para hacer match....- Experiencia sólida en Java (al menos 5 años).- Experiencia desarrollando con Java de la versión 8 en adelante con experiencia en microservicios(preferentemente Java /17/21).- Experiencia trabajando con DDD.- Experiencia trabajando con BBDD relacionales y no relacionales.- Experiencia con API First/Open API- Experiencia trabajando con colas (Kafka preferible).- Experiencia con test unitarios, integración. Automatización de test.- Conocimientos o experiencia en arquitectura hexagonal.¿Cuáles son nuestros propósitos para ti?❤️ Apoyarte en tu crecimiento profesionalEvolution mood: tendrás a tu disposición procesos diseñados específicamente para tus funciones y objetivos de crecimiento dentro de la compañía, junto con nuestro mapa de carreras, una herramienta para diseñar tu plan de desarrollo profesional.Formaciones: si bien quieres acceder a formaciones técnicas en habilidades o idiomas, tenemos a tu disposición certificaciones oficiales, Udemy Business, TechDays, Meetups, planes de formación...🧡 Promover en conjunto la salud, el bienestar y ¡El buen ambiente!Conciliación vida familiar y laboral: nos gusta que tengas equilibrio en tu vida personal y en tu carrera profesional, por lo que disfrutamos de 22 días de vacaciones + 2 días de libre disposición + 24 y 31 de diciembre, además de opciones de teletrabajo, horario flexible y jornada intensiva los viernes y en verano.Quokka: promovemos el bienestar emocional, la actividad física, y la nutrición saludable mediante nuestro programa de actividades.Actividades de Teambuilding: nos gusta divertirnos y estar en contacto con nuestros.Friends mood: puedes ser Embajador de nuestra marca a través de nuestro Plan Amigo.Club de ventajas: Programa de beneficios y descuentos (ocio, tecnología, bienestar...)Kudos: fomentamos una cultura de feedback y reconocimiento :)💛 Acordarnos de ti en tus momentos más especialesSorpresas: Tendrás alguna sorpresa asegurada durante el año (aniversario de trabajo, cumpleaños, nacimientos..).¿Te gustaría ser partícipe de nuestra evolución?

descripcion_original:
Company Description

More than 20 years ago, zooplus was one of the first to bring the pet category into the world of eCommerce. Today, we stand strong as Europe’s leading online pet platform, delivering moments of happiness to more than 9 million pet parents each year.

We're on a mission to create joy for pets and their parents, driven by our core values of Care, Courage, Openness, and Simplicity. At the heart of everything we do, they inspire us to grow, raise the bar for our customers and fuel a pet-first business.

Job Description

We are looking for a Senior Software Engineer with an awareness of the full development cycle: from design to deployment, including testing and maintenance, to join our Loyalty team in Madrid office. In this team we are responsible for analyzing, designing and creating business products that allow zooplus to engage new customers and increase customer retention.

You will:

  • Work with your team and Product Owner to design technical solutions for business challenges
  • Work in an Agile environment in close collaboration with other teams
  • Develop and deliver applications for our e-commerce platform
  • Automate test suites to maintain high quality standards
  • Operate and patch our production applications
  • Support our users with any doubts or issues they might have
  • Use state of the art technologies and practices

Your responsibilities will be:

  • Proactively participate in solution design, planning and alignment with your team and other teams
  • Contribute to every software development phase (not just coding)
  • Support users, helping them make great use of our products while finding possible improvements
  • Implement and deliver digital products and features
  • Give and be open to receive constructive feedback
  • Test your code and peers' code thoroughly to find possible bugs before launching to production
  • Build and maintain infrastructure as code project and pipelines

Aspects of our team and work environment that contribute to our success:

  • Our team is self-organized and autonomous, we proactively share our opinions and concerns on business requirements
  • We build and run our applications. We are cross functional with a DevOps mindset
  • We want to deliver software in a sustainable way, clean code and quality are important for us
  • Our environment encourages open communication and teamwork
  • We constantly challenge existing solutions and processes to find ways to do even better

Technologies, frameworks and practices we use:

  • Kotlin
  • React + typescript
  • Oracle, PostgreSQL
  • Kubernetes, Prometheus, Docker, Jenkins
  • AWS with terraform and cloud deployments (S3, SNS, SQS, RDS)
  • Git, Pair Programming, Pull Request, Peer Reviewing

Qualifications

  • 5+ years of experience in software development
  • Solid experience using Java 8+ or Kotlin
  • Strong concepts of clean code principles
  • Experience working with microservices and event-driven architectures
  • Hands-on experience with relational databases
  • English at working language level
  • You are interested in DevOps philosophy of "you build it, you run it"

Additional Information

With more than 1,000 passionate professionals located across 10 European offices, we believe our success comes from working together and leveraging our international strengths. Expect to work in a hybrid environment, collaborating with colleagues in different locations remotely.

Our benefits:

🐾 20% discount in our zooplus shop

📖 Internal and external training

🎈 Team events

✈️ 28 Annual Vacation Days

🩺 Private Medical Health Insurance

⏰ Hybrid working model (up to 40% Home Office per month)

Want to know more? Learn more about zooplus here, and check out our LinkedIn, Instagram, TikTok and YouTube to get a glimpse into the zooplus culture.

zooplus is committed to equal opportunity. We value and embrace diversity and inclusion of all team members.

zooplus is committed to equal opportunity. We value and embrace diversity and inclusion of all Team Members.

descripcion_original:
At Johnson & Johnson,we believe health is everything. Our strength in healthcare innovation empowers us to build aworld where complex diseases are prevented, treated, and cured,where treatments are smarter and less invasive, andsolutions are personal. Through our expertise in Innovative Medicine and MedTech, we are uniquely positioned to innovate across the full spectrum of healthcare solutions today to deliver the breakthroughs of tomorrow, and profoundly impact health for humanity. Learn more at https://www.jnj.com/ .

What You Will Do

  • Support in create and update reports to analize our performance in the markets we opperate inclunding sales, market shares, share of Voice, patient shares, etc..
  • Support in sales force excellence analisys (Frequency, potentials, target, indicator, etc..) of our account managers.
  • Learn about market research: Initiates key relationships with market research agencys and help BI team to developing market research .Assists in the planning of market research studies and budget control.
  • Learn to identify opportunities with regional partners, customers, Johnson and Johnson brands, and alliances. Develops significant familiarity with marketing plans, products, vendors, and sales contacts.
  • Coordinates with other functions to monitor and analyse market trends
  • Report all suspected adverse reactions, serious or non serious, I may be aware of within a maximum of 24 hours after being aware of it and communicate it to the Pharmacovigilance Department.

We Offer

  • One year internship.
  • 1000 euros/month
  • Full time
  • Start date - March
  • Bachelor's Degree in Business Administration, Marketing or similar; or Bachelor's Degree in Science with high interest in data and analytical skills.
  • Important Knowledge: Excel and ppt.
  • Fluent English.

DE&I Statement

For more than 130 years, diversity, equity & inclusion (DEI) has been a part of our cultural fabric at Johnson & Johnson and woven into how we do business every day. Rooted in Our Credo, the values of DEI fuel our pursuit to create a healthier, more equitable world. Our diverse workforce and culture of belonging accelerate innovation to solve the world's most pressing healthcare challenges.

We know that the success of our business - and our ability to deliver meaningful solutions - depends on how well we understand and meet the diverse needs of the communities we serve. Which is why we foster a culture of inclusion and belonging where all perspectives, abilities and experiences are valued and our people can reach their potential.

At Johnson & Johnson, we all belong.

#JNJEMEAStudentCareers

#JNJEMEAFullTime

descripcion_original:
Position Overview

Details of the role and how it fits into the team

As Analytics Senior Analyst you will be a member of our Data Analytics Center of Excellence (CoE) for Group Audit. You will pioneer and support Group Audit in implementing innovative and effective analytics processes that are critical to the success of our audit function. Based in the Madrid office, you will work embedded in audit teams around the world, applying the latest analytics technologies while connecting with the central team in Germany to leverage our core analytics solutions. You will be responsible for supporting all Group Audit functions with data analytics services and audit automation solutions.

Responsibilities

  • Evaluate and provide analytics solutions to auditors to identify potential risk, anomalies, detect outliers and identify weaknesses in control activities using analytical tools like SQL and Python.
  • Collaborate closely with auditors, data owner and subject matter experts to understand business requirement and translate them into analytical solution in an agile and iterative manner.
  • Communicate findings and insights to stakeholders including Senior Management that support informed decision-making process and effectively drive business strategy.
  • Proactively identify automation opportunities and develop solutions that simplify audit processes and make Group Audit more efficient.
  • Drive innovation across Group Audit, leveraging the experience gained and data collected from successful data analytics projects.


Skills

  • Master’s or bachelor’s degree (or equivalent – PhD appreciated) from an accredited college or university (or equivalent) in a quantitative field (Data Science, Mathematics, Statistics, Physics, Engineering, Computer Science, Economics, etc.) or equivalent work experience with at least 5 years of relevant experience.
  • Proficiency in SQL and Python for data analysis as well as in reporting and visualization with hands-on experience in ETL and datawarehouse, Hadoop, Hive/Impala as well as familiarity with GCP services and tools, OpenShift, CDSW,
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills with the ability to convey complex information in clear and concise manner to Senior Management, Audit committees and other stakeholder.
  • Strong problem-solving and analytical skill to interpret complex data and derive actionable insights.
  • A creative technologist passionate about data and information with an intrinsic motivation and curious to learn new technologies and frameworks to adopt data analytics for new ways of auditing.


Well-being & Benefits

A healthy, engaged and well-supported workforce are better equipped to do their best work and, more importantly, enjoy their lives inside and outside the workplace. That’s why we are committed to providing an environment with your development and wellbeing at its center.

  • Emotionally and mentally balanced: We support you in dealing with life crises, maintaining stability through illness, and maintaining good mental health. Benefit from initiatives such as counseling and support in difficult life situations and a culture where you can openly speak about mental health.
  • Physically thriving: We support you managing your physical health by taking appropriate preventive measures and providing a workplace that helps you thrive. For example, discount in gyms, annual medical check up's, standing desks, ...
  • Socially connected: We strongly believe in collaboration, inclusion and feeling connected to open up new perspectives and strengthen our self confidence and well being. Benefits vary from different types of paid and unpaid leave, hybrid model of remote working (for some positions …)
  • Financially secure: We support you to meet personal financial goals during your active career and for the future. Benefit from meal allowance, pension contribution plans, banking services for employees, flex compensation program...


We strive for a culture in which we are empowered to excel together every day. This includes acting responsibly, thinking commercially, taking initiative and working collaboratively.

Together we share and celebrate the successes of our people. Together we are Deutsche Bank Group.

We welcome applications from all people and promote a positive, fair and inclusive work environment.

titulo_oferta: Senior Engineer - AI Embedded Software (Italy based)
descripcion_original:
About Us

Axelera AI is not your regular deep-tech startup. We are creating the next-generation AI platform to support anyone who wants to help advancing humanity and improve the world around us.

In just three years, we have raised a total of $120 million and have built a world-class team of 180+ employees (including 55+ PhDs with more than 40,000 citations), both remotely from 11 different countries and with offices in Belgium, Switzerland, Italy, the UK, headquartered at the High Tech Campus in Eindhoven, Netherlands.

We have also launched our Metis™ AI Platform, which achieves a 3-5x increase in efficiency and performance, and have visibility into a strong business pipeline exceeding $100 million.

Our unwavering commitment to innovation has firmly established us as a global industry pioneer.

Are you up for the challenge?

Position Overview

As an AI Embedded Software Engineer at Axelera AI, you will develop and optimize software that enables seamless execution and validation of our custom AI accelerator chip. Working at the intersection of hardware and software, you will design bare-metal solutions for a specialized architecture, ensuring efficient communication and low-overhead integration with host systems.

This role involves close collaboration with hardware and customer teams to fine-tune workloads, enhance performance, and streamline deployment. You'll leverage your expertise in C, C++, Python, and automation tools, using industry-standard build systems and debugging utilities to push the boundaries of AI acceleration.

Key responsibilities:

  • Enable and optimize software functionality on various host machines for validating the execution of our custom AI accelerator chip.
  • Develop and maintain baremetal software for kernel execution for a hybrid specialized architecture with in-memory-computing blocks
  • Collaborate with Hardware and Customer teams to facilitate seamless workload execution and integration with different host environments.
  • Ensure efficient communication with low overheads for AI accelerator models
  • Work in C, C++, Python and scripting languages for automation.
  • Using build systems like Make, CMake, as well as GNU toolchains and debugging utilities.

Qualifications:

We’re looking for a profile that covers 70% of these professional experience items, in any combination:

  • Engineering degree in computer science or software engineering
  • 3+ years of experience – academic experience acceptable depending on projects
  • Hands-on experience working with various host machines (x86, ARM-based, or other architectures) and enabling software functionality on them.
  • Exposure to specialized semiconductors, particularly accelerators, GPUs, or custom AI chips.
  • Understanding of embedded systems architecture, including microprocessors, microcontrollers, and embedded operating systems
  • Experience with low-level programming, device drivers, or hardware/software integration.
  • Familiarity with system bring-up, debugging tools (gdb, JTAG, serial interfaces), and performance tuning.
  • Proficiency in Linux environments, including scripting, automation, and debugging system interactions.
  • Ability to work independently and as part of a team.

Nice to have:

  • PCI-Express protocol experience and other communication protocols
  • Yocto experience and creating custom Linux distributions
  • Level Zero API, CUDA, OpenCL experience

Location

This position is based Italy & we support relocation to Bologna, Florence or Milan for talent based abroad and interested in this role.

What We offer 

This is your chance to shape and be part of a dynamic, fast-growing, international organization. We offer an attractive compensation package, including a pension plan, extensive employee insurances and the option to get company shares. 

An open culture that supports creativity and continual innovation is awaiting you. Collaborative ownership and freedom with responsibility is characteristic for the way we act and work as a team. 

At Axelera AI, we wholeheartedly embrace equal opportunity and hold diversity in the highest regard. Our steadfast commitment is to cultivate a warm and inclusive environment that empowers and celebrates every member of our team. We welcome applicants from all backgrounds to join us in shaping the future of AI.

descripcion_original:
¡En Ayesa crecemos juntos/as!


Cada profesional de nuestra empresa es importante para nosotros/as, nos ayudan a crecer de manera diversa y gracias a ellos/as somos más de 14.000 personas trabajando con el mismo objetivo en más de 40 países. ¡Únete a la multinacional española tecnológica referente en el mundo!


Si eres una persona con vocación por la tecnología y quieres continuar con tu desarrollo profesional, a la vez que concilias tu vida profesional y personal… ¡Este es tu sitio!


En esta ocasión buscamos ampliar nuestro equipo con un Consultor/a DEI (Data Engineering Integration) para cliente del sector retail, que quieran continuar construyendo el futuro con nosotros/as.


¡Anímate a dar el salto! ¡Te estamos esperando!


Requisitos y funciones


  • Captura avanzada de requerimientos de negocio para el planteamiento de soluciones de arquitectura de datos.
  • Capacidad avanzada de análisis de problemas técnicos, y capacidad para aportar soluciones ágiles y eficientes.
  • Conocimientos avanzados de metodología y frameworks de desarrollo de software (Git, Visual Studio Code, PyCharm, Jupyter Notebook, etc.).
  • R: Nivel avanzado para preparación de scripts y tratamientos.
  • Python: Nivel avanzado para preparación de scripts y tratamientos.
  • SQL: Nivel avanzado para explotación de datos desde entornos como BigQuery.
  • Conocimiento avanzado de los principios de ETL y orquestación de tratamiento de datos con herramientas del tipo KNIME, Airflow, etc.
  • Conocimiento avanzado de entornos Cloud y herramientas de BigData (MongoDB, Spark, Hadoop, ElasticSearch, etc.).
  • Conocimiento avanzado en el desarrollo y trabajo con APIs.
  • Explotación de API de GA: NIvel avanzado.
  • Google Analytics medio + certificación GAIQ.
  • Google LookerStudio: Nivel avanzado.
  • PowerBI: Nivel avanzado.


Te ofrecemos un camino lleno de aventuras:

🔹 ¡Llega hasta donde tú quieras! Crece con nuestros programas de desarrollo! Te ayudaremos a marcar tu itinerario de futuro anualmente participando en proyectos vanguardistas con los mejores profesionales del sector.

🔹 Porque lo importante sois tú y los tuyos : contamos con políticas que facilitan la conciliación entre la vida profesional y personal: Flexibilidad horaria, Smart Job y jornada intensiva en verano.

🔹 Tú decides cómo usar tu dinero: disfruta de nuestra retribución flexible, contamos con: Seguro médico, Ticket Restaurant, Guardería y Transporte.

🔹 Plan Bienestar descuentos en viajes, tecnología, formación, deporte, belleza y ¡muchos más.

🔹 Diviértete participando en los diferentes concursos y actividades que organizamos: ¿te gusta el deporte, escribir, la fotografía? Todo tiene cabida.

🔹¡Actualízate! apostamos por un aprendizaje continuo, contamos con formación especializada, certificaciones e idiomas.

🔹¡Deja tu huella! Impacta con nuestros proyectos de voluntariado social.

¡Únete a la multinacional española tecnológica referente en el mundo! 💫🌎


Atendiendo a la Ley Orgánica 3/2007, de 22 de marzo, Ayesa se ha marcado como objetivo promover la defensa y aplicación efectiva del principio de igualdad entre hombres y mujeres, evitando cualquier tipo de discriminación laboral por razón de sexo, garantizando así las mismas oportunidades de ingreso. Asimismo, fomentamos la diversidad, rechazando cualquier tipo de discriminación por razones de raza, sexo, diversidad funcional, religión, orientación sexual, identidad sexual, o cualquier otra condición personal o social, apostando por construir un entorno inclusivo y enriquecedor.
descripcion: ¡En Ayesa crecemos juntos/as!Cada profesional de nuestra empresa es importante para nosotros/as, nos ayudan a crecer de manera diversa y gracias a ellos/as somos más de 14.000 personas trabajando con el mismo objetivo en más de 40 países. ¡Únete a la multinacional española tecnológica referente en el mundo!Si eres una persona con vocación por la tecnología y quieres continuar con tu desarrollo profesional, a la vez que concilias tu vida profesional y personal… ¡Este es tu sitio!En esta ocasión buscamos ampliar nuestro equipo con un Consultor/a DEI (Data Engineering Integration) para cliente del sector retail, que quieran continuar construyendo el futuro con nosotros/as.¡Anímate a dar el salto! ¡Te estamos esperando!Requisitos y funcionesCaptura avanzada de requerimientos de negocio para el planteamiento de soluciones de arquitectura de datos.Capacidad avanzada de análisis de problemas técnicos, y capacidad para aportar soluciones ágiles y eficientes.Conocimientos avanzados de metodología y frameworks de desarrollo de software (Git, Visual Studio Code, PyCharm, Jupyter Notebook, etc.).R: Nivel avanzado para preparación de scripts y tratamientos.Python: Nivel avanzado para preparación de scripts y tratamientos.SQL: Nivel avanzado para explotación de datos desde entornos como BigQuery.Conocimiento avanzado de los principios de ETL y orquestación de tratamiento de datos con herramientas del tipo KNIME, Airflow, etc.Conocimiento avanzado de entornos Cloud y herramientas de BigData (MongoDB, Spark, Hadoop, ElasticSearch, etc.).Conocimiento avanzado en el desarrollo y trabajo con APIs.Explotación de API de GA: NIvel avanzado.Google Analytics medio + certificación GAIQ.Google LookerStudio: Nivel avanzado.PowerBI: Nivel avanzado.Te ofrecemos un camino lleno de aventuras:🔹 ¡Llega hasta donde tú quieras! Crece con nuestros programas de desarrollo! Te ayudaremos a marcar tu itinerario de futuro anualmente participando en proyectos vanguardistas con los mejores profesionales del sector.🔹 Porque lo importante sois tú y los tuyos : contamos con políticas que facilitan la conciliación entre la vida profesional y personal: Flexibilidad horaria, Smart Job y jornada intensiva en verano.🔹 Tú decides cómo usar tu dinero: disfruta de nuestra retribución flexible, contamos con: Seguro médico, Ticket Restaurant, Guardería y Transporte.🔹 Plan Bienestar descuentos en viajes, tecnología, formación, deporte, belleza y ¡muchos más.🔹 Diviértete participando en los diferentes concursos y actividades que organizamos: ¿te gusta el deporte, escribir, la fotografía? Todo tiene cabida.🔹¡Actualízate! apostamos por un aprendizaje continuo, contamos con formación especializada, certificaciones e idiomas.🔹¡Deja tu huella! Impacta con nuestros proyectos de voluntariado social.¡Únete a la multinacional española tecnológica referente en el mundo! 💫🌎Atendiendo a la Ley Orgánica 3/2007, de 22 de marzo, Ayesa se ha marcado como objetivo promover la defensa y aplicación efectiva del principio de igualdad entre hombres y mujeres, evitando cualquier tipo de discriminación laboral por razón de sexo, garantizando así las mismas oportunidades de ingreso. Asimismo, fomentamos la diversidad, rechazando cualquier tipo de discriminación por razones de raza, sexo, diversidad funcional, religión, orientación sexual, identidad sexual, o cualquier otra condición personal o social, apostando por construir un entorno inclusivo y enriquecedor.

descripcion_original:
Passion for Innovation. Compassion for Patients.

With over 120 years of experience and more than 19,000 employees in over 30 countries, Daiichi Sankyo is dedicated to discovering, developing, and delivering new standards of care that enrich the quality of life around the world.

In Europe, we focus on two areas: The goal of our Specialty Business is to protect people from cardiovascular disease, the leading cause of death in Europe, and help patients who suffer from it to enjoy every precious moment of life. In Oncology, we strive to become a global pharma innovator with competitive advantage, creating novel therapies for people with cancer.

Our European headquarters are in Munich, Germany, and we have affiliates in 14 European countries and Canada.

Business Intelligence Specialist

Propósito De La Función

Como especialista de Forecasting, su función es estimar las ventas de los productos de la compañía y su revisión a lo largo del año.

Como especialista en Sales Force Effectiveness, su función es maximizar la eficiencia y efectividad del equipo de ventas estableciendo objetivos/incentivos, targeting y segmentación de clientes, dimensionamiento de las redes comerciales y desarrollo de KPIs para el seguimiento de los objetivos de la compañía.

Responsabilidades Principales

FORECASTING

  • Llevar a cabo con la mayor precisión y objetividad la definición del Budget anual de los productos de la compañía utilizando diferentes metodologías
  • Desarrollo a lo largo del año del forecast comercial y logístico tanto en el corto como en el largo plazo de los productos de la compañía
  • Análisis de sensibilidad en los forecast y Budget anual que permitan identificar oportunidades y gestionar riesgos
  • Revisión continua de todos los factores que pueden impactar en el forecast: performance de ventas, datos de mercado, actividades clave, nuevos lanzamientos internos, etc..
  • Colaboración con Marketing y Finanzas para garantizar el mayor conocimiento de actividades y acciones que puedan impactar en el forecast
  • Trabajar conjuntamente con el Market Research Manager y Brand Leads para conocer los máximos detalles de las tendencias del mercado y drivers que puedan impactar en el Forecast
  • Trabajar en colaboración con el equipo de Supply Chain (DSES & DSE) para asegurar su perfecta alineación con la estrategia de los productos
  • Presentación y defensa de la metodología, asunciones y resultados del Buget anual al senior management
  • Presentación y defensa de la metodología, asunciones y resultados del forecast estratégico y logístico al senior management en las diferentes revisiones a lo largo del año


SALES FORCE EFFECTIVENESS

  • Objetivos de la red de ventas:
    • Desarrollo y propuesta de diferentes metodologías que permitan alinear los objetivos y la estrategia de la compañía con los objetivos de la red de ventas, asegurando una completa alineación con el departamento comercial en el desarrollo de las mismas
    • Participación en el Comité de Objetivos/Incentivos en la presentación y defensa de la metodología, asunciones y resultados
    • Elaboración de análisis periódicos para facilitar la revisión periódica de la evolución en la consecución de los objetivos por parte de la red de ventas
    • Publicación de objetivos
    • Análisis relacionados con el cumplimiento de los objetivos y la metodología utilizada para su cálculo
  • Incentivo de la red de ventas:
    • En colaboración con Comité de Incentivos definición de los Incentivos relacionados con SFE y elaboración de las correspondientes Normativas
    • Calculo trimestral de los incentivos y presentación al Comité de Objetivos/Incentivos para su aprobación y posterior publicación
    • En colaboración con los departamentos de Finanzas y RRHH elaboración del forecast trimestral del pago anual de incentivos
  • Métricas y KPIS
    • En colaboración con los equipos regionales y DSE identificación de métricas/KPIs relevantes para la consecución de los objetivos de la compañía
    • En colaboración con el Performance & Customer Insights Sr Mgr definición de métricas y KPIs alineados con los objetivos de la compañía que deben ser implementados
    • En colaboración con el data manager, elaboración de informes estandarizados que faciliten el seguimiento de las métricas y KPIs establecidos, así como la elaboración puntual de informes a medida con el mismo fin
  • Targeting & Segmentación
    • En colaboración con el AT (AA) y el departamento comercial definición del targeting & segmentación de clientes, así como la elaboración de los planes de ejecución de los diferentes productos de la compañía
  • Dimensionamiento de Red de Ventas, MSLs y RAMs
    • En colaboración con el Performance & Cusotmer Insights Sr Mgr y las direcciones comercial, médico y acceso definición de los criterios y metodologías para definir el tamaño y estructura de las correspondientes redes
  • Análisis a medida
    • Elaboración de análisis y/o informes para resolver necesidades de negocio puntuales o necesidades surgidas de otros proyectos en curso


Requerimientos Del Puesto

  • Licenciado en matemáticas, ingeniería, ciencias económicas, Business Intelligence, ciencias de la salud, etc
  • Más de 5 años de experiencia en posición similar
  • Elevada experiencia en la elaboración de forecast, establecimiento de objetivos/incentivos, dimensionamiento de redes, targeting y segmentación de clientes, etc
  • Experiencia en la industria farmacéutica o consultoría
  • Manejo de experto en Microsoft, especialmente Excel y Power Point
  • Experiencia en entornos internaciones
  • Experiencia trabajando equipos cross funcionales
  • Nivel alto de inglés


Será altamente valorado

  • Experiencia trabajando con metodología agile
  • Conocimiento a nivel usuario de herramientas de análisis, Qlik Sense, Power BI, etc..
  • Conocimientos de analítica avanzada


Why work with us?

Working at Daiichi Sankyo is more than just a job – it is your chance to make a difference and change patients’ lives for the better. We can only achieve this ambitious goal together. That is why we foster a culture of mutual respect and continuous learning, with a strong commitment to inclusion and diversity. Here, you will have the opportunity to grow, think boldly, and contribute your ideas. If you have a proactive mindset and passion for addressing the needs of patients, we eagerly await your application.

For more information: www.daiichi-sankyo.es

What we offer

  • Excellent Benefits
  • Work-Life-Balance
  • Growth and Development
  • Health and Wellbeing Support

descripcion_original:
You will play a pivotal role in improving the performance, reliability, and transparency of the TomTom Navigation SDK , through collaboration and alignment across multiple teams within the organization.

What You'll Do

  • Provide automated system-level measurements and benchmarks for performance regression detection, leading to early identification and resolution of performance issues
  • Enable the production of product KPIs aligned with customer expectations and product management requirements, enhancing transparency and driving product improvements
  • Design, build and operate a framework for meaningful data consumption measurements, allowing for informed decision-making on the impact of various choices on data consumption for specific scenarios
  • Lead the effort to create a common/shared solution for data consumption measurements, fostering collaboration across teams and driving the development of a dedicated framework
  • Manage the performance benchmark framework for regression detection on the component level, ensuring that performance regressions in components are detected early and actionable results are provided to the respective teams
  • Own the publishing of test results to dashboards, providing stakeholders with clear and accessible visualizations of benchmark results

What You'll Need

  • Android Development Understanding of Android framework and development tools
  • SDK Development Experience in SDK development and understanding of its impact on system performance
  • Hardware Configuration Knowledge Understanding of different hardware configurations and their impact on system-level measurements
  • Profiling and Performance Optimization Experience in analyzing system-level performance, identifying bottlenecks, and optimizing performance
  • Scripting and Automation Ability to automate the execution of benchmarks and measurements
  • Collaboration and Communication Capable of working with product management to align benchmarks with product KPIs and effectively communicate results

What We Offer

A competitive compensation package, of course.

Time and resources to grow and develop, including a personal development budget and paid leave for learning days, as well as paid access to e-learning resources such as O’Reilly and LinkedIn Learning.

Time to support life outside of work, with enhanced parental leave plus paid leave to care for loved ones and volunteer in local communities.

Work flexibility, where TomTom’ers, in agreement with their manager and team, use both the office and home to focus, collaborate, learn and socialize. It’s all about getting the best out of both worlds – we ask TomTom’ers to come to the office two days a week, and the remaining three are free to be worked in either location.

Improve your home office with a setup budget and get extra support with a monthly allowance.

Enjoy options to work from your home country and abroad for a set number of days each year, to visit family and friends, or to simply explore the world we’re mapping.

Take the holidays you want with a competitive holiday plan, plus an extra day off to celebrate your birthday.

Join annual events like our Hackathon and DevDays to bring your ideas to life with talented teammates from around the world.

Become a part of our inclusive global culture and have the chance to collaborate with a diverse community – we have over 80 nationalities at TomTom!

Find out more about our global benefits and enjoy additional local benefits tailored to your location.

Meet your team

We are the Map Visualization Product Unit. We develop map rendering technology that can be integrated into navigation systems and location-based applications, providing our technology to our customers in the form of cloud-based APIs and SDKs.

We see quality-management processes as a source of competitive advantage. As part of our product-led and outcome-oriented culture, we believe it is crucial to have mechanisms in place to measure and improve the quality of our products in a continuous manner so we can achieve our mission of mapping the world in real time.

At TomTom...

You’ll help people find their way in the world. In 2004, TomTom revolutionized how the world moves with the introduction of the first portable navigation device. Now, we intend to do it again by engineering the first-ever real-time map, the smartest and most useful map on the planet.

Work with a team of 3,700 unique, curious and passionate problem-solvers. Together, we’ll open up a world of possibilities for car manufacturers, enterprises and developers to help people understand and get closer to the world around them.

After you apply

Our recruitment team will work hard to give you a meaningful experience throughout your journey with us, no matter the outcome. Your application will be screened closely and you can rest assured that all follow-up actions will be thorough, from assessments and interviews all the way through onboarding. To find out more about our application process, check out our hiring FAQs .

TomTom is an equal opportunity employer

TomTom is where you can find your place in the world. Every day we welcome, nurture and celebrate differences. Why? Because your uniqueness is what makes you, you. No matter your culture or background, you’ll find your impact at TomTom. Research also shows that sometimes women and underrepresented communities can be hesitant to apply for positions unless they believe they meet 100% of the criteria. If you can relate to this, please know that we’d love to hear from you.

titulo_oferta: IT System Engineer / empresa fabricante HW (H/M/D)
descripcion_original:
El puesto: Ingeniero de Sistemas Redes 📡

Localización: Barcelona o Madrid 🌍

Requisitos: Conocimientos en redes LAN, WAN, y SMB 🌐

Lo que ofrecemos: Oportunidad en una empresa líder en el sector 💼


El Proyecto

Una de las empresas más reconocidas en el sector de redes, con un sólido historial de innovación y liderazgo en la industria, busca incorporar un Ingeniero de Sistemas de IT para formar parte de su equipo.

Lo que la empresa ofrece

  • Oportunidad de desarrollo profesional en una empresa de prestigio
  • Trabajo en proyectos innovadores con impacto real en la conectividad global
  • Ambiente dinámico y colaborativo
  • Formación continua y acceso a las últimas tecnologías

Lo que harás

  • Habilitación de socios: Proporcionarás soporte técnico en sitio, formación y educación para los socios, ayudándoles a mejorar su capacidad para ofrecer soluciones basadas en las tecnologías de la empresa.
  • Gestión de proyectos técnicos: Liderarás proyectos técnicos, desde la concepción hasta la implementación, trabajando con equipos internos y externos para garantizar que las soluciones se entreguen según los requisitos.
  • Desarrollo de soluciones técnicas: Colaborarás con los equipos de ventas y productos para diseñar soluciones adaptadas a las necesidades de los clientes, especialmente en áreas de redes LAN, WAN y soluciones inalámbricas para PYMES.
  • Capacitación continua: Ofrecerás formación tanto a nivel interno (equipo de ventas) como externo (socios), incluyendo clases presenciales y webinars para garantizar el máximo aprovechamiento de las soluciones técnicas.
  • Gestión de evaluaciones de productos: Coordinarás y supervisarás las evaluaciones de productos con los clientes, gestionando los equipos de demostración y ayudando a los clientes en su proceso de selección.
  • Apoyo en marketing y posicionamiento de productos: Colaborarás con el departamento de marketing en la creación de materiales que resalten las características y beneficios de las soluciones de la empresa.
  • Representación de la empresa: Participarás activamente en ferias, conferencias y eventos del sector, representando a la empresa y manteniendo relaciones con clientes y prensa del sector.
  • Interacción con equipos de productos: Mantendrás contacto regular con los gerentes de producto para compartir las necesidades del mercado, las tendencias y las solicitudes de características de los clientes.
  • Asesoramiento en diseño y configuración de redes: Ayudarás a los socios en el diseño y la configuración de redes, ofreciendo asesoramiento técnico y solucionando problemas complejos relacionados con la infraestructura de redes.

Lo que buscamos

  • Mínimo 5 años de experiencia en la industria de redes
  • Ingeniero en telecomunicacion o equivalente
  • Conocimientos avanzados en LAN, WAN y redes SMB
  • Capacidad para gestionar múltiples proyectos y cuentas simultáneamente
  • Habilidades de comunicación y relaciones interpersonales a nivel organizacional
  • Flexibilidad y actitud proactiva frente a desafíos técnicos
  • Certificación CCNA (preferible)
  • Disponibilidad para viajar hasta un 50%

descripcion_original:
Job Description

If you are willing to participate in the definition and implementation of the future mission systems software architecture to be developed in the next years and contribute to continuing delivering value to our current customers for Medium & Light and UAS platforms, here you have an opportunity to develop your profesional career within Airbus Defence & Space in Getafe.

A vacancy for a Software Engineer has arisen within the Mission A/C & Ground Software Department.

We develop onboard and on ground mission systems to manage the different inputs and data from different sensors (EOIR, AIS, Radar, DataLinks) and provide an enriched tactical picture to the operators (Pilots, Co-Pilots, C2 operators, etcetera) enabling mission planning, monitoring, execution and debriefing capabilities.

The Selected Candidate Will Be Responsible For

The detailed design, implementation and verification of microservices based software components, and the configuration and deployment of the software components to be delivered into the different environments (development environment, integration environment and production environments) and the evolution of the overall software and deployment architecture to adapt the current mission software products to the needs of our customers and clients in alignment with the combat Cloud vision.

The candidate will be part of an existing and experienced team that will allow him/her to learn and grow in a professional environment. The candidate will find a motivated and cooperative software department where his/her experiences and technical knowledge along with the capacity to understand the different system needs, and the capacity to deliver will be really appreciated and valued.

Besides the technical requirements the candidate has to be open minded, innovative, decisive and willing to participate in an agile environment where he/she will grow his/her professional career.

The candidate will be part of our Core ISR Sw Architecture team working in our latest state-of-the-art

product.

Delivering Value is our aim, Agile is our way.

Required Skills

  • At least 2 - 3 years of experience in a related field
  • Advance knowledge and experience in C/C++ language is required
  • Advance knowledge and experience in the whole Software Development Cycle is required

(Sw requirements, Sw Design, Sw Validation & Verification, Sw Maintenance)

  • Knowledge and experience with Software Validation and Verification (unit testing,

white/black box testing, sw smoke testing, sw non-regression testing) is required

  • Knowledge and experience with linux OS is required
  • Specific experience with SUSE Linux distribution is desirable
  • Knowledge & experience with Sw design patterns (publisher/subscriber, IoC, Dependency

Injection, distributed command & control, auto scalable patterns), specifically related with

modern Service Oriented Architectures , Cloud Native & Microservices architectures is

beneficial.

  • Knowledge of Agile methods (SCRUM + KANBAN + SAFe) is beneficial
  • Knowledge of HMI middelaware (QT)

Responsibilities

  • Provide sufficient detailed data and information about system elements to enable the implementation consistent with architectural entities as defined in models and views of the system architecture and in accordance with the allocated requirements.
  • Verify the compliance of a detailed design solution toward baseline of validated requirements for a single sub-system / equipment / component / module.

This job requires an awareness of any potential compliance risks and a commitment to act with integrity, as the foundation for the Company’s success, reputation and sustainable growth.

Company

Airbus Defence and Space SAU

Employment Type

Permanent

Experience Level

Professional

Job Family

Software Engineering

By submitting your CV or application you are consenting to Airbus using and storing information about you for monitoring purposes relating to your application or future employment. This information will only be used by Airbus.

Airbus is committed to achieving workforce diversity and creating an inclusive working environment. We welcome all applications irrespective of social and cultural background, age, gender, disability, sexual orientation or religious belief.

Airbus is, and always has been, committed to equal opportunities for all. As such, we will never ask for any type of monetary exchange in the frame of a recruitment process. Any impersonation of Airbus to do so should be reported to emsom@airbus.com.

At Airbus, we support you to work, connect and collaborate more easily and flexibly. Wherever possible, we foster flexible working arrangements to stimulate innovative thinking.

#YESPOST

titulo_oferta: System Engineer – Hybrid Cloud Infrastructure (x|f|m) - Hybrid
descripcion_original:
We are looking for a System Engineer – Hybrid Cloud Infrastructure (x|f|m) for our IT Infrastructure & Operations department.

In this role you will be responsible for the global infrastructure on-premises and in the cloud. In addition to the day-to-day business, you will be responsible for the continuous development and improvement of the infrastructure.

Furthermore, you will be involved in exciting projects and actively drive the cloud strategy and shaping the future with us.

Grow with us – Your Responsibilities

  • You will be responsible for supporting our complex, enterprise-wide hybrid infrastructure (cloud and on-premise) in terms of utilization, performance and security
  • This includes the development and implementation of new solutions and the continuous improvement of the current environment
  • As part of a global team, you will be responsible for the operation, maintenance, monitoring and automation of the hybrid infrastructure
  • You will advise internal customers on cloud and on-premise IT infrastructure solutions and participate in international IT projects
  • Creating and updating the documentation of IT systems and services as well as the associated operating processes rounds off your area of responsibility

What will convince us

  • You have successfully completed a degree with a focus on computer science, preferably with comparable qualifications
  • We require several years of relevant professional experience with hybrid infrastructures and cloud services (SaaS, IaaS), in particular Microsoft such as M365, AzureAD/EntraID
  • Comprehensive knowledge of Active Directory, Azure AD, Azure as a standard identity platform and security technologies such as SSO, MFA, conditional access in a hybrid cloud infrastructure environment
  • You have many years of experience with infrastructure topics such as virtual servers on VMWare or HyperV (Windows, Linux) as well as backup, patch management and monitoring
  • You are familiar with the administration of Terminal Server/Citrix environments and/or Certificate Authorities (PKI)
  • First completed certificates (ITIL Foundation, MCSE) are desirable
  • Your profile is rounded off by fluency in English, French language skills are a plus and an occasional willingness to travel, especially to our location in Aubagne, France

What we offer

Benefits

As a growing global life science company, stock listed on the DAX and TecDAX, Sartorius offers a wide range of Benefits:

  • Personal and Professional Development: Mentoring, leadership programs, Talent Talks, LinkedIn Learning, internal seminar offerings , coaching for managers
  • Work life balance: Remote options, flextime, flexible work schedules, sabbaticals
  • Making an impact right from the start: Comprehensive onboarding, including a virtual online platform even before joining, Welcome Workshops, "buddy" as point of contact
  • Welcoming Culture: Mutual support, teamspirit and international collaboration; communities on numerous topics, such as coaching, agile working and business women network

About Sartorius

Sartorius is part of the solution in the fight against cancer, dementia, and many other diseases. Our technologies help translate scientific discoveries into real-world medicine faster, so that new therapeutics can reach patients worldwide.

We look for ambitious team players and creative minds, who want to contribute to this goal and advance their careers in a dynamic global environment.

Join our global team and become part of the solution. We are looking forward to receiving your application.

www.sartorius.com/careers

titulo_oferta: Senior Software Engineer - Cross Border payments (Madrid / Barcelona)
descripcion_original:
Position Overview

Software Engineer (COBOL/CICS/DB2)

 Details of the role and how it fits into the team

The candidate will design and develop application code, implements technical solutions, and configures applications in response to business needs. To meet the requirements of the business, the candidate will actively participate in the technical design and architecture of the application or its components, proposes appropriate solution to use and promotes re-usability of existing components. Working in a collaborative environment.

The candidate should have deep knowledge of systems and applications under him/her control, manage the changes and collaborate in the technical analysis, implementation and testing of approved projects. Candidate will also participate in the application maintenance tasks.

The candidates will work on applications based on mainframe technology (Cobol/Cics/DB2).

Your Key Responsibilities

  • Technical design, programming and testing
  • New projects, enhancements and maintenance of a specific for a set of applications
  • IT Application Life Cycle standards are met in ongoing enhancements and maintenance
  • Application changes are aligned with the application strategy and technology roadmap
  • Identification and management of risk and issues associated with the application
  • Maximum operational availability and stability
  • Cost efficiency


Your Skills And Experiences

  • English and Spanish advance required
  • Knowledge and experience in systems and end-to-end processes.
  • Experience in Cobol/Cics/DB2 analysis and programming is a must
  • Experience in application solutions from technological perspective. Ability to understand key aspects of technical platforms and infrastructure, generate ideas and create effective solutions
  • Solid knowledge of software engineering, design patterns and software architecture
  • Development background and demonstrated experience as analyst.
  • Experience on analysis of existing systems from high level architecture to application code review
  • Experience with technical documentation, architectural diagram, components, flows, use cases
  • Demonstrable DevOps-oriented mind-set
  • Experience with testing/QA tools
  • Person with solid technical knowledge and able to understand complex business processes and workflows
  • Teamwork capacity with multidisciplinary teams
  • Leadership and communication skills
  • Person with high commitment.
  • Results-focused
  • Ability to identify risks, resolve conflicts and plan tasks
  • Demonstrated ability to work under pressure and meet deadlines
  • Knowledge of methodologies in applications development (e.g. Agile)


What We Will Offer You

  • The candidate will be part of the transformation program of the company, transformation from organizational / methodology point of view but also being part of the technical evolution of the systems.
  • Key to internalize the knowledge.
  • Opportunity for continued growth
  • Involved in international projects working with teams distributed all over the world


We strive for a culture in which we are empowered to excel together every day. This includes acting responsibly, thinking commercially, taking initiative and working collaboratively.

Together we share and celebrate the successes of our people. Together we are Deutsche Bank Group.

We welcome applications from all people and promote a positive, fair and inclusive work environment.

descripcion_original:
Description

As a Senior Software Development Engineer in the Amazon Device OS organization, you will own the definition and implementation of a software development environment that enables building applications for millions of devices, such as Fire TV, Echo and more.

This role offers a unique opportunity to work at the intersection of native app development, debugging tools, and UI tooling. If you have a passion for on-device software, and making it easy for app developers to create interactive visual experiences, this is an ideal position for you. As a developer developing tools for other developers, you will be challenged to create rich customer applications, while also optimizing for performance and ease of use by customers.

You will engage with an experienced cross-disciplinary staff to conceive and design innovative customer experiences. You will create new solutions in a responsive, flexible and collaborative peer environment. You will participate in designing, prototyping, and building solutions to hard problems in the Amazon ecosystem for our exciting future in consumer devices.

Key job responsibilities

As a Senior Software Development Engineer, You Will

  • Design and implement reliable, high-performance SDKs for a variety of Amazon devices (e.g., Amazon Echo, FireTV) at a high-quality bar
  • Experiment and prototype with novel technologies that improve the customer experience and solve business needs
  • Work with internal and external engineering teams to understand and respond to their needs
  • Organize and participate in collaborative Q&A sessions, workshops, presentations to share your technical know-how
  • Mentor junior team members in career growth

Basic Qualifications

  • Bachelor's degree in computer science or equivalent
  • 6+ years of full software development life cycle, including code reviews, source control management, build processes, testing, and operations experience
  • Experience programming with at least one modern language such as C++, Rust, Java or TypeScript.
  • Experience in computer science fundamentals (object-oriented design, data structures, algorithm design, problem solving and complexity analysis)

Preferred Qualifications

  • Working experience and knowledge on debugging tools such as GDB, LLDB, ADB, Symbol Servers, Elfutils
  • Embedded firmware development experience
  • Experience communicating with users, other technical teams, and senior management to collect requirements, describe software product features, write technical designs, and discuss product strategy

Amazon is an equal opportunities employer. We believe passionately that employing a diverse workforce is central to our success. We make recruiting decisions based on your experience and skills. We value your passion to discover, invent, simplify and build. Protecting your privacy and the security of your data is a longstanding top priority for Amazon. Please consult our Privacy Notice (https://www.amazon.jobs/en/privacy_page) to know more about how we collect, use and transfer the personal data of our candidates.


Company - Amazon Spain Services, S.L.U.

Job ID: A2616366

descripcion_original:
Country: Spain

Data Management & Governance Associate Expert I

Join Openbank, the 100% digital bank of the Santander Group, where innovation meets opportunity! With over 2 million customers across Spain, Germany, the Netherlands, Portugal, we're leading the way in digital banking. From loans and mortgages to a cutting-edge, fully automated investment platform, our products are transforming the industry.

At Openbank, we pride ourselves on simplicity, agility, and security, earning us the title of the most recommended Spanish bank among our customers. And we're not stopping there! As we expand internationally, with plans to launch in Mexico and the United States, there's never been a more exciting time to join our team.

If you're passionate about digital innovation, eager to make an impact, and ready to be part of a dynamic and forward-thinking company, then we want to hear from you! Join us and be part of our journey to redefine banking for the digital age!

Mission and responsibilities:

The CDO team at Openbank leads and drives data projects, ensuring the implementation of global policies and standards while promoting data as a key asset. The team safeguards against potential data risks, supporting both Spain’s operations and international expansion.

This role as Data Governance & Monitoring Associate Expert will include:

  • Contribute to management of the data lifecycle, ensuring data governance and control.
  • Guarantee Group alignment in data strategy transposing best practices and accomplishing global targets.
  • Execution of BAU tasks requested by global function.
  • Evolve and continue feeding the data management tools already in use:
  • Elaboration of Data Management indicators for monthly review.
  • Data Dictionary&Traceability Management.
  • Reports library Mgmt.
  • Cooperation&Monitoring of Data Activities: with the technology division responsible, business and other functions, to define and develop analytical and reporting capabilities. Establish a solid data management procedure involving the roles who: request, execute and validate the information produced, to avoid duplicity, distrust, inefficiency.
  • Preparation of committees.
  • Review and transposition of policies and documentation.

To be successful in the role you must have:

  • At least 6 years of experience in Data Management and Data Analytics
  • Experience in cross projects management
  • Good communication skills
  • Experience in the financial/banking industry.
  • Ability to query data in SQL and/or Python and MS Office proficient.
  • Advanced knowledge of data architectures (preferable big data arch) and associated technologies related to data (IT stack of a financial entity).
  • Preferable experience using Data management tools.
  • Languages: Fluent Spanish and Advanced English (minimum requirement).

What do we offer?

  • Joining a dynamic and agile company undergoing international expansion.
  • Working in start-up mode with the support of the Santander Group.
  • Competitive remuneration and attractive benefits package.
  • Possibility of growth within the company and the Group.
  • Collaborating on international projects in different countries.
  • Excellent work environment, social clubs and frequent events.

Would you like to grow with us? Join our team!

Openbank is an equal opportunity employer. All applicants will be considered as equal without paying attention to gender identity, sexual orientation, ethnicity, religion, age, political orientation, union membership nor disability status.

We make recruiting decisions based on your experience and skills. We value your passion to discover, invent, simplify, and build.

The personal data you provide as well as any data generated during the selection process are confidential and will be processed by Open Bank, S.A./ Open Digital Services, S.L. with registered office at Plaza de Santa Bárbara 2, 28004 (Madrid), for the sole purpose of managing your participation in the selection processes and, where appropriate, to formalise your recruitment. 

For further information about your rights and data protection, please read the ODS/Openbank Privacy Policy applicable to this type of data processing here. 

#OPENBANK

OBDATA22

Cooperation&Monitoring of Data Activities: with the technology division responsible, business and other functions, to define and develop analytical and reporting capabilities. Establish a solid data management procedure involving the roles who: request, execute and validate the information produced, to avoid duplicity, distrust, inefficiency.  Preparation of committees.  Review and transposition of policies and documentation. To be successful in the role you must have: At least 6 years of experience in Data Management and Data Analytics Experience in cross projects management Good communication skills Experience in the financial/banking industry.  Ability to query data in SQL and/or Python and MS Office proficient.  Advanced knowledge of data architectures (preferable big data arch) and associated technologies related to data (IT stack of a financial entity).  Preferable experience using Data management tools.  Languages: Fluent Spanish and Advanced English (minimum requirement). What do we offer? Joining a dynamic and agile company undergoing international expansion.  Working in start-up mode with the support of the Santander Group.  Competitive remuneration and attractive benefits package.  Possibility of growth within the company and the Group.  Collaborating on international projects in different countries.  Excellent work environment, social clubs and frequent events. Would you like to grow with us? Join our team!Openbank is an equal opportunity employer. All applicants will be considered as equal without paying attention to gender identity, sexual orientation, ethnicity, religion, age, political orientation, union membership nor disability status. We make recruiting decisions based on your experience and skills. We value your passion to discover, invent, simplify, and build.The personal data you provide as well as any data generated during the selection process are confidential and will be processed by Open Bank, S.A./ Open Digital Services, S.L. with registered office at Plaza de Santa Bárbara 2, 28004 (Madrid), for the sole purpose of managing your participation in the selection processes and, where appropriate, to formalise your recruitment. For further information about your rights and data protection, please read the ODS/Openbank Privacy Policy applicable to this type of data processing here. #OPENBANKOBDATA22

descripcion_original:
Share this job



The Data Analytics Platform Architect is responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining the robust and scalable infrastructure that supports the organization's data analytics initiatives.

Role will focus on ensuring optimal performance, data flow processes, and adherence to development standards. & play a critical role in enabling the organization to extract maximum value from its data.

As Platform Architect you will collaborate closely with development teams, functional teams, and other stakeholders to drive the successful implementation and evolution of the analytics platform.

Your Involvement

  • Platform Architecture: Design, develop the platform architecture for the data analytics, including data warehouses, data lakes, and analytics tools.
  • Data Integration: Design and support data source integration development and optimizations of data flow processes to ensure efficient data ingestion, transformation, and delivery to analytics consumers.
  • Performance Optimization: Monitor and optimize platform performance to meet evolving business needs and minimize query latency.
  • Development Guidelines: Establish and maintain guidelines and best practices for development teams working on the platform, ensuring consistency and quality.
  • Technical Checks: Conduct regular technical checks of solutions provided by development teams to ensure compliance with standards and identify potential issues.
  • Planning Optimizations: Collaborate with stakeholders to plan and implement optimizations for the platform, including capacity planning, performance tuning, automation, and infrastructure upgrades.
  • Consultations: Provide technical consultations to development teams on platform usage, best practices, and troubleshooting.
  • Code Review: Review code developed by teams to ensure compliance with standards, identify potential issues, and recommend improvements.
  • Collaboration with Functional Teams: Work closely with functional teams to understand their data requirements and translate them into technical specifications for the platform.
  • Emerging Technologies: Stay up-to-date with emerging technologies and trends in data analytics to identify opportunities for innovation and improvement.

Your Background

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field
  • 5+ years of experience in data analytics platform architecture and development
  • Strong technical expertise in data warehousing, data lakes, and analytics tools
  • Experience with cloud platforms: Azure, DataBricks or others
  • Proficiency in SQL, Python, and other relevant programming languages
  • Knowledge of data modeling and data governance principles
  • Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills
  • Strong communication and collaboration skills
  • Ability to work independently and as part of a team

Your Advantage Will Be

  • Experience with data virtualization and data federation technologies
  • Knowledge of machine learning and artificial intelligence
  • Experience with data quality and data profiling tools
  • Certifications in relevant technologies (e.g., Microsoft Certified: Azure Data Engineer)

We Offer

  • Contract of employment
  • Benefits for taking care about your safe life, health, mental condition and keep your body in good shape (life insurance, medical care, mental support platform, sport card)
  • Working in international environment
  • Being part of greater "green" future purpose

Apply now

Location Krakow, Lesser Poland, Poland;

Brno, Jihomoravský kraj, Czechia;

Madrid, Madrid, Spain;

Milan, Lombardy, Italy;

Prague, Bohemia, Czechia Job type Full time Experience Experienced Job function IT, Telecom & Internet Contract Regular Publication date 2024-12-03 Reference number R0063502

descripcion_original:
Descripción De La Beca

Abbott tiene un Programa de Prácticas en el incorpora becarios que puedan unirse a nuestro equipo de mejora continua. Esta es una oportunidad única para adquirir experiencia práctica y desarrollar habilidades valiosas en el uso de herramientas de business intelligence y análisis de datos.

Funciones / Áreas De Aprendizaje

  • Aprender a utilizar la herramienta de business intelligence AIP.
  • Conocer el proceso de integración de datos del sistema informático del laboratorio (LIS) y del middleware en AIP.
  • Participar en la customización AIP utilizando consultas SQL para generar informes personalizados.
  • Aprender cómo optimizar consultas SQL para mejorar el rendimiento de los informes.
  • Formarse en el análisis datos y extraer insights valiosos para la toma de decisiones informadas.
  • Ver cómo presentar resultados de análisis de manera clara y efectiva.
  • Participar en proyectos prácticos y estudios de caso reales.

Perfil De La Beca

  • Formación universitaria en áreas como Informática, Ingeniería, Matemáticas, Estadística o similares, que haya permitido adquirir conocimientos sólidos de SQL.
  • Interés en el análisis de datos y la mejora continua.
  • Capacidad para participar de tareas en equipo y comunicarse de manera efectiva.
  • Motivación para aprender y aplicar nuevas habilidades.
  • Se valorarán conocimientos de laboratorio.
  • Disponibilidad para realizar una beca a jornada completa.
  • Inglés: C1 (Alto)

Beneficios

  • Adquirir experiencia práctica en el uso de herramientas de business intelligence.
  • Desarrollar habilidades en análisis de datos y generación de informes.
  • Oportunidad de trabajar en proyectos reales y contribuir al rendimiento operativo de Abbott.
  • Formación y mentoría por parte de profesionales experimentados.

Anímate a formar parte de nuestro equipo de Nutrición. Tendrás la oportunidad de colaborar con grandes expert@s donde podrás desarrollar competencias claves para tu carrera profesional y estar en continuo aprendizaje.

Conecta con nosotros en www.abbott.com, en LinkedIn www.linkedin.com/company/abbott-/ , en Facebook http://www.facebook.com/Abbott y en Twitter @AbbottNews.

titulo_oferta: Senior Software Engineer - Tibco BPM to uFlow Migration (Madrid / Barcelona)
descripcion_original:
Position Overview

Software Engineer (Tech Lead BPM)

 Details of the role and how it fits into the team

The candidate has to have very good technical skills & leadership in order to oversees the technical aspects of a delivery team by making software engineering and design decisions, guiding team members in technical matters and supervising system modifications in response to business needs. To meet the requirements of the business, the candidate will actively participates in the technical design and architecture design of the application or its components, proposes appropriate solution to use and promotes re-usability of existing components. Working in a collaborative environment.

The candidate should have deep knowledge of systems and applications under him/her control, manage the changes and collaborate in the technical and architectural design, analysis and implementation of approved projects.

A Tech Lead can be considered a leader, developer and technical reference all in one, which defines their essential skill set:

  • As a leader, supervise team members, delegate tasks, issue feedback, evaluate risks and resolve conflicts,
  • As a developer, use programming tools and existing frameworks, apply defined design patterns and best practices and perform automated testing
  • As a technical reference, perform technical assessments, oversee development lifecycles and release management and ensure product quality and improvement


Your Key Responsibilities

  • Establishing initiative specifications and technical direction
  • Fostering the use of existing frameworks, technical standards and procedures (certified delivery)
  • Overseeing software quality and system modifications
  • Guiding team members with troubleshooting technical issues
  • Guaranteeing Non Functional Requirements (NFRs) are properly considered so sustainable, scalable and resilient products are delivered
  • Establishing a continuous improvement approach on delivered products.
  • IT Application Life Cycle standards are met in ongoing enhancements and maintenance
  • Application changes are aligned with the application strategy and technology roadmap
  • Identification and management of risk and issues associated with the application
  • Setting the technical direction of a product / application, being its technical owner
  • Maximum operational availability and stability
  • Cost efficiency


Your Skills And Experiences

  • English and Spanish advance required
  • Technical guidance and decision-making skills
  • Experience and solid knowledge of software engineering, systems testing, design patterns and software architecture
  • Experience in application solutions from technological perspective. Ability to understand key aspects of technical platforms and infrastructure, generate ideas and create effective solutions
  • Development background and demonstrated experience as analyst.
  • Experience on analysis of existing systems from high level architecture to application code review
  • Experience with technical documentation, architectural diagram, components, flows, use cases
  • Demonstrable DevOps-oriented mind-set
  • Experience with testing/Quality Assurance (QA) tools
  • Person with solid technical knowledge and able to understand complex business processes and workflows
  • Teamwork capacity with multidisciplinary teams
  • Leadership and communication skills
  • Person with high commitment.
  • Results-focused
  • Ability to identify risks, resolve conflicts and plan tasks
  • Demonstrated ability to work under pressure and meet deadlines
  • Knowledge of methodologies in applications development (e.g. Agile)
  • Technical guidance and decision-making skills
  • Problem solving
  • Innovation
  • Ownership and vision
  • Experience and solid knowledge with:
    • TIBCO BusinessWorks
    • TIBCO iProcess
    • Camunda
    • Java 7/8/11/17
    • Spring Boot
    • Docker
    • Git / GitHub
    • SOAP REST
    • Maven
    • Junit / Mockito
    • Openshift 4.x / GKE / Kubernetes
    • JIRA / Bitbucket / Confluence
    • Sonar Qube
    • PL/SQL
    • Relic
    • Splunk
    • Securitization / mTLS / Certificate management
  • Would be highly appreciated experience with
    • Teamcity / Jenkins
    • Changes & Releases management
    • Google Cloud Platform
    • FrontEnd knowledge (Angular / React)


What We Will Offer You

  • The candidate will be part of the transformation program of the company, transformation from organizational / methodology point of view but also being part of the technical evolution of the systems.
  • Key to internalize the knowledge.
  • Opportunity for continued growth
  • Involved in international projects working with teams distributed all over the world


We strive for a culture in which we are empowered to excel together every day. This includes acting responsibly, thinking commercially, taking initiative and working collaboratively.

Together we share and celebrate the successes of our people. Together we are Deutsche Bank Group.

We welcome applications from all people and promote a positive, fair and inclusive work environment.
